sentences.en: Gyrate The dancers gyrated wildly to the strong beat of the music.
sentences.cn: 跳舞者随着音乐的强烈节奏而猛烈地旋转着.

sentences.en: Interest rates began to gyrate up towards 20 per cent in 1980 and then down and up again.
sentences.cn: 1980年利率开始攀升至20%，随后又起伏不定。

sentences.en: The dancers gyrated wildly to the beat of the music.
sentences.cn: 舞蹈员随着音乐的节奏疯狂地旋转起舞。

sentences.en: The woman began to gyrate to the music.
sentences.cn: 这位女子开始随着音乐旋转。

sentences.en: You can't gyrate your hips, bend over backwards, dip your partner, or do any other fancy (and calorie burning) dance moves if you can't control your core muscles.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能控制好你的核心肌肉，你就不能扭动臀部、向后弯曲、转动你的搭档，或者做其他一些有奇特的花样（燃烧卡路里）。

trans.tran_en: to turn around fast in circles
